author: Joe
text: The fees and prices you people charge are ridiculous. I wont be using StockX again.
title: The fees and prices you people charge…

author: James R
text: After purchasing from your site I started getting fraud purchases with my credit card. I know it’s your site as I haven’t used that card before.
title: Shoes were on point but beware of card fraud!

author: Jes
text: I ordered 7.5 W Jordan 1s and received 11 M Yeezys without stock x green tag verification. Wrong shoe. This is my first time ordering from Stock x don’t know what happened here. I sent the shoes back already waiting for my refund.
title: Wrong sneakers came in mail.

author: Abdul Rahman
text:
I was said to receive my item. However, I did not receive it. Can you double check to make sure I get it.

Can you make sure I receive my item because I don’t want to waste the money I worked for for the last 15 months

Is there anything you could do because it’s been a week
title: I was said to receive my item

author: Leila
text: My order was canceled and refunded for no reason.
title: My order was canceled and refunded for…

text: I accidentally order wrong size, just after 5 min I was unable to change it,
title: I accidentally order wrong size

author: Floss
text:
They say you have 3 days to return. I tried before the items were received by their warehouse for inspection.  I was told I could sell the items on their site but there are no returns.

Not exactly up front.
title: They say you have 3 days to return

author: Zamzam
text: there no return available that mean i don't  do any purchases after that .
title: there no return available that mean i…

author: Aaron
text: I ordered product waited a week it was never shipped or delivered refunded without as much as a phone call as to why
title: I ordered product waited a week it was…

author: Jim
text: Took around 2 weeks to ship so it was quite a bit longer than expected. The package arrived opened, so someone was snooping around inside of it. Would have appreciated the package being more secure because if whoever opened it had any interest in what was inside, they would have stolen it. The price was also pretty ridiculous and looking at the same item a few weeks later, it is 100$ less then I paid for it. Needless to say, this "premium limited" stuff isn't for me after this purchase.
title: High price, long shipping time, package looter

author: David
text:
The authentication process is a joke.
Didn't pick up that the shoes where the wrong size. Website makes it nearly impossible to return items. Save you cash and use a more reputable outlet.
title: The authentication process is a joke.

author: Elizabeth  Allinson
text: Too short a time to request reselling.
title: Too short a time to request reselling.

text: Iam not happy with my order because my Jordan shoe box itself is damaged.
